titles.title: To amend the General Education Provisions Act to allow State and county prosecutors access to student records in certain cases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Youth and Families.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 9/27/1995--Introduced. Amends the General Education Provisions Act to allow State and county prosecutors access to student records, without a court order and before or after adjudication, if the information sought pertains to a criminal investigation or prosecution of the student.
